Santa_Barbara.La Cumbre Plaza: La Cumbre Plaza is an upscale, outdoor shopping center located in Santa Barbara, California. The first property built by The Hahn Company, La Cumbre Plaza opened in 1967 and was purchased by Macerich in 2004. The shopping center spans 491,000 square feet and is anchored by a Vons grocery store and department stores Sears and Macy's.
